text: :wave: Heya! Heads up devs: if you do any debugging in the network tab, we've updated the CSS/JS assets attached to custom modules. Instead of seeing `module_{id}.js`, youâ€™ll now see `module_{id}_path_to_module.js`. This is now live, but modules will need to be re-published for the path to update. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions :sprocket:
